item.description:
Please RSVP!

Kier McDonough, the Principal and Portfolio Manager of brìgos capital management, he will be analyzing 3 past big leaders: Chipotle Mexican Grille (CMG), Wal-Mart (WMT), and Monster Beverage/Hansen Natural (MNST). It is the study of these past winners that will guide you to future success. He will also discuss the current market environment and the potential for a new Super cycle starting in 2013.

Kier has been an investment professional for 27 years.  Kier was also a workshop instructor for Investor’s Business Daily for three years, teaching their introductory and intermediate “How to Make Money in Stocks” seminars to individuals nationwide.

He will also talk about the market and examine charts of your stock picks.

If you haven't been to an IBD meet up in a while, please come.


Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: November IBD Meetup
